column7: Surveys the three major East Asian civilizations from ancient and classical times, through the period of Western influence, political revolution, and modernization, to the contemporary age and the emergence of East Asian superpowers. Same as EALC 120. Credit is not given for both HIST 120 and EALC 135.
column9: Same as EALC 120. Credit is not given for both HIST 120 and EALC 135.
column10: Humanities - Hist & Phil, and Cultural Studies - Non-West course.
